uk.ac.leeds.ccg.shapefile
Class ShapePoint

java.lang.Object
  |

              +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.shapefile.ShapePoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDReferenced, java.io.Serializable, ShapefileShape
public class ShapePoint
extends GeoPoint
implements ShapefileShape, java.io.Serializable

Wrapper for a Shapefile point. This now extends GeoPoint from the GeoTools package. To use this class without requiering any of geotools un-coment the marked lines and remove extends

See Also:
